import React from 'react' import BidItem from './BidItem' import HorizontalBar from './HorizontalBar' import Panel from './Panel' import Text from './Text' export default function FlightDetails({data}) { const {departure, arrival, from, to, type, flight} = {departure: "12:30 AM", arrival: "2:20 AM", from: "DCA", to: "DFW", type: "Boeing 747-800", flight: "AA 2010"} const bids = [{name: "John Doe", price: "$300"}] return

{`${type}`} {`${flight}`}

{[...bids, ...bids, ...bids].map((bid, index) => )}
}
